name: Our Savior Beaver
description:
The bush fires are destroying your lands and rabbits are on the run but they can't travel by land because of the current state of the forest.

They grab a twig and begin swirving through the valley's waters were predators are ready to take advantage of them.

You have given up on life yourself, after having a couple brews you do the unthinkable. 

To fit the “buggy” theme the camera controls are hard and real messy, press(MOUSE RIGHT CLICK) to fix your rotation! There are also objects around the map that are not rendered, fly onto them!
